text: In the Wee Wee Hours... is a 1987 American short documentary film about homeless people in Los Angeles, directed by Izak Ben-Meir. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 films Category:1987 short films Category:1987 documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about homelessness in the United States Category:Documentary films about Los Angeles
title: In the Wee Wee Hours...
